title: Worth how many words?
brief_description: A variety of fast and slow motion shots flash on the screen to stimulate and capture the audience. The narration explains how film and photography, time, motion, colour and form can be used to capture events and extend awareness and understanding. Emphasizes the versatility of the camera and unique uses in research and education.
